error.signature: OverflowError: Python int too large to convert to C long
error.regex: OverflowError: (Python )?int too large to convert to C (long|ssize_t)

verdict.summary: Python arbitrary-precision int exceeds C long range when passed to C extension or numpy.

dead_ends.why_fails: Loses precision for very large integers
Does not help â€” C long is already 64-bit on 64-bit Linux; the int is simply too large

workarounds.action: Use numpy int64 or Python's math module for the calculation
workarounds.how: np.int64(value) if within 64-bit range, or use pure Python arithmetic

workarounds.action: Chunk the large integer operation to stay within C long bounds
workarounds.how: Process in batches or use libraries that handle arbitrary precision natively
